parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To cry aloud, shriek. A primary verb; properly, to 'croak' or scream, i.e. to call aloud.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To convulse, throw into spasms. Prolongation from spairo; to mangle, i.e. Convluse with epilepsy.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
As if, as it were, like; with numbers: about. From hos and ei; as if.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.
So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.
(a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.
